rules: No monkey patches - fix issues at the source, not with workarounds
Always run typecheck after making TypeScript changes
Always run build before saying a task is complete
Prefer editing existing files over creating new ones
Use existing patterns in the codebase - don't introduce new paradigms without discussion
No console.log left in production code - use proper logging or remove
All affiliate/sponsor links must have rel='sponsored' and proper disclaimers
Test localStorage features in incognito to verify fresh state behavior
When fixing a bug, understand the root cause first - don't just suppress symptoms
If something seems wrong, investigate before proceeding
Commit messages should explain WHY, not just WHAT
No hardcoded secrets or API keys - use environment variables
